channel.title: Webclient ERROR. PLZ HELP!
channel.description:
When I use the webclient I Get this error... [code]basic: Added progress listener: sun.plugin.util.ProgressMonitorAdapter@14f271d basic: Plugin2ClassLoader.addURL parent called for file:/C:/Users/Carl/Desktop/PK%20PARADISE/client.jar basic: Starting applet teardown basic: Applet loaded. basic: Applet resized and added to parent container basic: PERF: AppletExecutionRunnable - applet.init() BEGIN ; jvmLaunch dt 512799 us, pluginInit dt 195605536 us, TotalTime: 196118335 us Pk Paradise is loading.. plugin2manager.parentwindowDispose java.security.AccessControlException: access denied ("java.io.FilePermission" "nullmain_file_cache.dat" "read") at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.File.exists(Unknown Source) at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:47) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) basic: Applet initialized basic: Starting applet basic: completed perf rollup basic: Applet made visible basic: Applet started basic: Told clients applet is started Exception in thread "Thread-30" java.security.AccessControlException: access denied ("java.io.FilePermission" "nullMaps\mapConfig.txt" "read") at java.security.AccessControlContext.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkPermission(Unknown Source) at java.lang.SecurityManager.checkRead(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:78) at client.startUp(client.java:8485) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5780) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Here6 java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:6004) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:174) at com.sun.deploy.uitoolkit.impl.awt.AWTAppletAdapter.destroy(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) basic: Finished applet teardown basic: Removed progress listener: sun.plugin.util.ProgressMonitorAdapter@1fb96de [/code]
And when I just run the jar file (client.jar) it works perfectly so its not the client.jar but its in the webclient [code]<HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE>Not your buisness</TITLE> <body bgcolor="black"> <META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE"> </HEAD>
<BODY> <center> <applet name="client" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet> </BODY> </HTML> [/code]

item.title: Webclient ERROR. PLZ HELP!
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

Just change the archive of your client.jar. Like upload it to fileden and put the direct link in the “client.jar” position.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient ERROR. PLZ HELP!
item.dc:creator: @propker212 propker212
item.description:
@propker212 wrote:

When I use the webclient I Get this error…

basic: Added progress listener: sun.plugin.util.ProgressMonitorAdapter@14f271d basic: Plugin2ClassLoader.addURL parent called for file:/C:/Users/Carl/Desktop/PK%20PARADISE/client.jar basic: Starting applet teardown basic: Applet loaded. basic: Applet resized and added to parent container basic: PERF: AppletExecutionRunnable - applet.init() BEGIN ;
